notes: On 11 March 2020, in Santiago, Metropolitana region, around 500 people, including students and hooded people, gathered in different parts of the city and installed barricades during a demonstration against the second anniversary of Pinera's government, with the aim to show dissatisfaction with the lack of answers about the social demands. As a result, two people (one of them a minor) were severely injured, and both the victims remained in a critical health condition. [size=no report]

The group claimed that the process of buying land from private owners has been slowed down by bureaucratic procedures. Part of the group started a permanent strike near governmental offices. [size=no report]
